entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Partly cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
